sentences.en: An ounce is one sixteenth of a pound.
sentences.cn: 一盎斯是十六分之一磅.

sentences.en: An ounce of practice is worth a pound of theory.
sentences.cn: 一分实践当得十分理论.

sentences.en: Enjoy up to an ounce a day of nuts and dark chocolate to provide all the benefits you need without excess calories, fat, or sugar.
sentences.cn: 每天吃一盎司的坚果和黑巧克力会提供所需的所有能量，不需补充额外的热量、脂肪和糖类。

sentences.en: He has used up the last ounce of oil.
sentences.cn: 他已用完最后一滴油.

sentences.en: He poured in every ounce of power but couldn't make it.
sentences.cn: 他竭尽了全力却无济于事.

sentences.en: How to pronounce the noun "ounce" in the announcement?
sentences.cn: 布告中的名词“盎司“怎样发音？

sentences.en: I am also surprisingly strong and can eat about a three - ounce weight.
sentences.cn: 我还是意想不到地强壮,能吃约三盎司的重量.

sentences.en: I knew every ounce would weigh on me like a little anchor, so I was determined not to include a single item that was unnecessary or superfluous.
sentences.cn: 我意识到每盎司的重量都会成为一个小小的船锚压迫着我，所以我决定不带任何一样不必要的或多余的东西。

sentences.en: I spent every ounce of energy trying to hide.
sentences.cn: 我费尽力气想藏起来。

sentences.en: If you have an efficient distance per stroke, you're using every ounce of energy to carry yourself forward.
sentences.cn: 如果你的单划距离合适，那么你身体的每一盎司精力都将用于前进！

sentences.en: In early trading in Hong Kong yesterday, gold was quoted at $368.20 an ounce.
sentences.cn: 在香港昨天早些时候的交易中，黄金的牌价为每盎司368.20美元。

sentences.en: It is sold by ounce.
sentences.cn: 这是论盎司卖的.

sentences.en: Michelle will also spin a customer's wool fleece to specification at a cost of $2.25 an ounce.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔也会按顾客的要求为其纺羊毛呢，每盎司收费2.25美元。

sentences.en: One ounce of almonds contains nearly half the recommended daily amount.
sentences.cn: 一盎司杏仁大约包含每日需求量的一半。

sentences.en: That will call for every ounce of energy we have.
sentences.cn: 这就需要我们全力以赴.

sentences.en: The 9” long, 9 ounce device works when you are in motion—just plug in your mobile device, place the nPower PEG vertically in your bag or on your hip and go for a walk or run.
sentences.cn: 这种设备长9英寸，重9盎司，可在你运动过程中发电——只需把移动设备插到摇摇发电机上，并把发电机垂直地放在包�或挂在臀部，然后走动或跑动即可。

sentences.en: The chemistry teacher weighed out one ounce of the compound.
sentences.cn: 化学老师称出一盎司化合物.

sentences.en: The dancers didn't have an ounce of energy left.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈演员们用尽了体力.

sentences.en: There's not an ounce of truth in her story.
sentences.cn: 她所说的一点都不真实。

sentences.en: This little ball of gold weighs a quarter of an ounce.
sentences.cn: 这个小金球重0.25盎司。

trans.tran_cn: 盎司，<口>少量，一点儿，雪豹
trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 28.35 grams. There are 16 ounces in a pound.
